quickfire:
- 10% reload per projectile. Multiple projectiles are really op.
- Gene, Amber, Pam, Spike, Griff
timed detonation:
- Map slowly breaks before going overtime halfway through. Open map meta overates any preexisting mode/map meta.
- Piper, Pearl, Nani, Belle
big friend:
- Your team is set to the health of highest hp brawler on your team. Tanky brawler + high dps is good.
- Collette, 8-bit
